Klant: I'm not sure if I am ready, actually.

The Mini-Mafia started to for=
m Mobster...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, December 13, 2000 8:17 PM
  Subjec=
t: The battle is joined!


  :::Hellbat/Treadshot/Hurricane/Godfather/Sharp=
edge/Jetstorm/Orion/Torca/Ratche

  t/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx::: 

  ::Hellbat, =
Treadshot, Hurricane, and Godfather reach the CF and arm 
  themselves for =
battle.  Sharpedge reaches the CF and lands, Jetstorm 
  transforming to ro=
bot mode:: 
  Sharpedge: Mafia, merge and form Mobster, take a shot at the =
CF while the 
  sheilds are down.  Jetstorm, your with me, we'll try to pic=
k off as many 
  Maximals as possible, move out! 
  ::Sharpedge and Jetstor=
m head closer to the CF.  Sharpedge fires 2 missles at 
  Hot Rod and Jetst=
orm fires 25 energy blasts and 25 rapid fire optic blasts at 
  him:: 
  He=
llbat: Batbreast, eject! 
  ::Batbreast launches out and tries to suck Ange=
l Prime's blood.  Treadshot 
  fires 25 shots from Catgut at Angel Prime.  =
Hurricane fires 15 lightning 
  bolts at Windlord.  Godfather fires 8 shots=
 from his pistol at Teltoli.  My 
  Maximals charge into battle except for =
Torca, who stays by Klant.  Orion 
  fires 2 missles and Ratchet fires 8 sh=
ots from each of his two guns at 
  Sixshot.  Sideswipe fires 25 shots from=
 his rifle and 2 missles at Dark One, 
  and Sky Lynx fires 2 missles from =
his two missle launchers at him(thats six 
  missles and 25 bullets heading=
 for Dark One):: 
  Torca: Klant, buddy, you ready to engage the enemy? 
  =
      eGroups Sponsor
